article_title: Few in NC prepared for ACA tax changes
article_text: H&R Block offered free consultations in Raleigh and around the country Thursday to alert regular customers and potential customers to tax changes triggered by the Affordable Care Act. The law is about to bring the most sweeping changes in the federal tax code in the past two decades.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Affordable, Care, Act, Obamacare, Subsidy, Tax, Health, Insurance, Exemption, H&R Block

The law is about to bring the most sweeping changes in the federal tax code in the past two decades.
H&R Block offered free consultations in Raleigh and around the country Thursday to alert regular customers and potential customers to tax changes triggered by the Affordable Care Act.
